Electronic reproduction. [S.l.] : HathiTrust Digital Library, 2010. MiAaHDL.
Papers in English; includes the original French texts of six papers in the appendix.

results.title: The sounds of early cinema / edited by Richard Abel and Rick Altman.
abstracts: This is the first book devoted exclusively to a little-known phenomenon: the ubiquitous presence of sound in early cinema. 'Silent cinema' may rarely have been silent, but the sheer diversity of sounds characterizing the early moving pictures can still astonish us, from barkers and ballyhoos, to pianists and orchestras. These essays cover a broad range of subjects, including sound practices in production, sound-related exhibition practices, film music, and the politics of film reception.

results.title: Game addiction [electronic resource] : the experience and the effects / Neils Clark and P. Shavaun Scott.
abstracts: "This book studies videogame addiction from a cross-disciplinary approach, bridging the divide between liberal arts academics and clinical researchers. The topic of addiction is examined neutrally, using accepted research in neuroscience, media studies, and developmental psychology, among others, to reveal how today's gamers interact with and become consumed by the virtual worlds of their videogames"--Provided by publisher.

results.title: Practising videojournalism [electronic resource] / Vivien Morgan.
abstracts: Including interviews with pioneers of videojournalism within TV, and photographic stills, this is a valuable guide on how to combine journalistic writing ability with video skills.Offering information on key skills, Videojournalism gives both students and practicing journalists access to a wide job market, and keeps them in step with the multi-skilled journalist demanded by the media today.

results.title: Nintendo Wii Flash game creator's guide [electronic resource] : design, develop, and share your games online / Todd Perkins.
abstracts: This is the only book to show you how to create Flash games for the wildly popular Wii. The Nintendo Wii is the first game console to support Adobe Flash animation. This book teaches essential Flash animation and ActionScript skills so you can create several popular types of games to play on the Wii. You will be able to share your newly created games on the Web with other users via the Wii's online connection service. In addition to covering game programming skills, "Nintendo Wii Flash Game Creator's Guide" reveals how to create games that use the Wii's controllers in a variety of innovative ways - techniques that are not widely known. You will also learn how to scale game graphics for viewing on any TV.

results.title: Mean streets and raging bulls [electronic resource] : the legacy of film noir in contemporary American cinema / Richard Martin.
abstracts: Filmography: p. 163-171.
Includes bibliographical references (p. 173-188) and index.

results.title: From mouse to mermaid : the politics of film, gender, and culture / Elizabeth Bell, Lynda Haas, Laura Sells, editors.
abstracts: From Mouse to Mermaid, an interdisciplinary collection of original essays, is the first comprehensive, critical treatment of Disney cinema. Addressing children's classics as well as the Disney affiliates' more recent attempts to capture adult audiences, the contributors respond to the Disney film legacy from feminist, marxist, poststructuralist, and cultural studies perspectives. The volume contemplates Disney's duality as an American icon and as an industry of cultural production, created in and through fifty years of filmmaking. The contributors treat a range of topics at issue in contemporary cultural studies: the performance of gender, race, and class; the engendered images of science, nature, technology, family, and business. The compilation of voices in From Mouse to Mermaid creates a persuasive cultural critique of Disney's ideology. The contributors are Bryan Attebery, Elizabeth Bell, Claudia Card, Chris Cuomo, Ramona Fernandez, Henry A. Giroux, Robert Haas, Lynda Haas, Susan Jeffords, N. Soyini Madison, Susan Miller, Patrick Murphy, David Payne, Greg Rode, Laura Sells, and Jack Zipes.

results.title: The Oriental obscene : violence and racial fantasies in the Vietnam era / Sylvia Shin Huey Chong.
abstracts: This book explores the impact of media representations of violence during the Vietnam War on people in the U.S.-specifically how images of violence done to and by the Vietnamese were traumatic in ways that deeply affected the American psyche.

results.title: Southeast Asian independent cinema [electronic resource] : essays, documents, interviews / edited by Tilman Baumgärtel.
abstracts: The rise of independent cinema in Southeast Asia, following the emergence of a new generation of filmmakers there, is among the most significant recent developments in global cinema. This book documents these developments as a genuine outcome of the democratization and liberalization of film production.

results.title: PSP game creation for teens [electronic resource] / Michael Duggan.
abstracts: Contains instructions and advice for teen and beginning game developers to create fun and exciting games and cartoon animations for the PSP using Adobe Flash.

results.title: The video game explosion [electronic resource] : a history from PONG to Playstation and beyond / edited by Mark J.P. Wolf.
abstracts: Includes bibliographical references (p. [317]-342) and index.

results.title: The meaning of video games [electronic resource] : gaming and textual strategies / Steven E. Jones.
abstracts: The Meaning of Video Games takes a textual studies approach to an increasingly important form of expression in today's culture. It begins by assuming that video games are meaningful-not just as sociological or economic or cultural evidence, but in their own right, as cultural expressions worthy of scholarly attention. In this way, this book makes a contribution to the study of video games, but it also aims to enrich textual studies. Early video game studies scholars were quick to point out that a game should never be reduced to merely its "story" or narrative content and they rightly insist on the importance of studying games as games. But here Steven E. Jones demonstrates that textual studies-which grows historically out of ancient questions of textual recension, multiple versions, production, reproduction, and reception-can fruitfully be applied to the study of video games. Citing specific examples such as Myst and Lost, Katamari Damacy, Halo, Nintendo's Wii, and Will Wright's Spore, the book explores the ways in which textual studies concepts-authorial intention, textual variability and performance, the paratext, publishing history and the social text-can shed light on video games as more than formal systems. It treats video games as cultural forms of expression that are received as they are played, out in the world, where their meanings get made.

abstracts: "This book studies videogame addiction from a cross-disciplinary approach, bridging the divide between liberal arts academics and clinical researchers. The topic of addiction is examined neutrally, using accepted research in neuroscience, media studies, and developmental psychology, among others, to reveal how today's gamers interact with and become consumed by the virtual worlds of their videogames"--Provided by publisher.

results.title: Writing for animation, comics & games / Christy Marx.
abstracts: Writing for Animation, Comics, and Games explains the practical aspects of creating scripts for animation, comics, graphic novels, and computer games. It details how you can create scripts that are in the right industry format, and follow the expected rules for you to put your best foot forward to help you break-in to the trade. This book explains approaches to writing for exterior storytelling (animation, games); interior/exterior storytelling (comics and graphic novels), as well as considerations for non-linear computer games in the shortest, pithiest, and most economical way. The author offers insider's advice on how you can present work as professional, how to meet deadlines, how visual writing differs from prose, and the art of collaboration. * Career rules of-the-road for comics, computer games, and animation ... from an insider's perspective * Written for beginners and professionals alike * Authored by a distinguished writer, whose credits include X-Men Evolution, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and Lord of the Rings.

results.title: 自媒体时代实战行销术 : 不必花大钱, 用"真诚"与"内容"打动顾客!一人公司、新创公司、自由业都适用, 从公关、宣传、到网路行销, 精准传递品牌&商品价值创造好业绩! / 李娟受, 文仁宣著 ; 林大恳译.
abstracts: 自媒体时代人人皆为行销管道之一, 使得公关行销的门槛降低了, 但同时创新力、企划力及诚信的执行力却也显得更为重要, 请丢掉"很难, 要花钱做, 或是找外面的专家来做"这种消极的态度. 本书以"丰富的案例说明"与"明确的架构和方法", 精准掌握行销平台, 布局适合自己公司的宣传策略, 进一步将产品有效推广到大众面前. 请抛弃旧有的行销思维, 透过创新力做出效果超好的公关行销5大策略! 过去夸大其词的华丽宣传语已经无效, 不如用"真相型沟通方法"吸引消费者的注意! 行销文案不是产品说明书或是履历表, 要以"故事内容"来突显品牌定位并引起共鸣! 了解大数据分析及社群媒体高黏着度, 靠低成本、精准镊子行销术, 直接拥抱消费者! 用"共享经验"制造与消费者的"关系", 透过不同的平台获得关注, 发挥最大CP值!.

results.title: 追剧商战 : 解密Netflix、迪士尼、苹果、华纳、亚马逊的串流市场疯狂争霸 = Binge times : inside Hollywood's furious billion-dollar battle to take down Netflix / 戴德·海耶斯, 彤恩·施莫洛斯基作 ; 周怡伶译.
abstracts: 在人人追剧的线上串流时代, 全球观众每天收看的影片长达十二亿小时, 带来亿万等级的商机. 本书作者深耕影视产业数十年, 潜入各企业的核心, 探索这段追剧狂潮中的关键要角、企业动机、科技、行销与财务模式, 以及推动趋势的关键事件, 为这场非比寻常的商业大战写下全方位的纪录. 他们访谈了无数高层、第一线人士与华尔街分析师, 取得前所未见的商业内幕, 详尽解析各大企业面对全新趋势的重大决策过程、内部文化的冲突与挣扎, 以及市场、股价和观众最真实犀利的回应, 揭开这场串流战争的真实面貌, 生动刻画出我们身处的"追剧时代". 这是一段引人入胜、充满傲慢与野心的故事. 面对新的趋势, 我们总是一脚踩进未来, 另一脚还在过去, 步步为营地寻找新的突破与平衡. 无论你身在哪一个领域, 这场仍在上演中的惊人商战, 都能带来无比珍贵的启发.

results.title: 爆款短视频 : 7天打造你的百万粉丝 / 白雪著.
abstracts: 《爆款短视频: 7天打造你的百万粉丝》一书从"人设"标签、涨粉妙招、内容创意、热搜体质、商业变现等8大关键点, 结合10大运营误区, 手把手教你从零打造爆款. 帮你在短视频红海中杀出重围, 快速打造流量时代"低成本、高销量、强连结"的爆款内容. 掌握了爆款公式, 你也能7天打造属于自己的百万粉丝!.

results.title: 日本顶尖知识YouTuber资讯汇整术 : 蒐集x判读x表达 连9岁小孩都能听懂! / 及川幸久著 ; 赖惠铃译.
abstracts: 从9岁小孩到80岁老人, 都在听他讲国际政经局势! 观看数超过1亿2000万次, 日本最懂"转译"复杂资讯的顶尖知识YouTuber! 一个素人如何在短短4年间, 打造出连9岁小女孩都看得懂、订阅数超过45万的国际趋势频道? 他蒐集资料与日日发片的秘诀, 究竟是什么? 他又用什么方法快速吸粉、涨粉?.

results.title: 抖音 : 短影音、演算法、年轻化 世界最有价值新创公司的成功秘密 = Attention factory : the story of TikTok and China's ByteDance / 马修·布伦南著 ; 张美惠译.
abstracts: 抖音, 公认全球最强独角兽：全球下载成长率超越脸书、IG、YouTube；估值比Uber高、用户比推特多；到底是怎么养成的？抖音(TikTok)是中国网路狂潮中迅速发展起来的一个社交媒体app, 原基础是一款音乐创意短影片(最短15秒)社交软体, 可选择歌曲、拍摄短影音、也能上传照片. 推出后席卷全球年轻世代. 据2020年统计数据, 抖音(和TikTok)在全球手机应用商店下载超过20亿次, 日活跃用户数量超过6亿, 逾2千200万创作者发表内容. 2012年, 抖音母公司字节跳动(ByteDance)只是一家不起眼的公司, 创办人张一鸣与员工挤在北京一间破旧的公寓「锦秋家园」. 当人们吸收资讯的方式从传统的文字、语音、逐渐向图片、短影音转移, 字节跳动抓到时机, 最后透过抖音在全球攻城掠地开花结果. 如今, 它已成为全球成长速度最快的独角兽, 市值超过1,000亿美元. 抖音短影音将后台生产流程简化, 降低创作门槛, 且长度短、制造迷因以病毒式传播的速度快, 符合年轻人的习惯和喜好, 其赞助选秀节目《中国有嘻哈》就风靡一时. 强大的演算法是抖音让用户上瘾的主因, 点开抖音之后, 「为你推荐」页面会出现一连串的短影音, 依据内容概况(关键字、发表时间......)、使用者概况(年龄、性别、浏览记录、装置类型......)和环境概况(工作、家里或地铁通勤......), 推荐用户可能会喜欢的内容, 创造出极高的黏着度. 字节跳动早期也开始与小型经销商合作, 将app预载到待售的中低阶安卓手机, 获取数千万使用者. 中期则并购泰勒丝、女神卡卡、凯蒂‧佩芮等巨星都在其上分享影片的Musical.ly(2014年由阳陆育和朱骏创办), 获取三千万用户, 也成为全球最强、成长最快的短影音app, 成长速度打败谷歌和脸书这类重量级大哥, 也逼中国本地的腾讯(微视)退出短影片市场. 抖音引发的热潮在2020年达到巅峰, 美国川普总统以资安问题要求字节跳动出售抖音在美业务、印度也下架包含抖音在内的中国app、传说将上市......, 全世界的目光都集中在抖音下一步. 关于抖音及其中国母公司字节跳动的文章已成千上万, 资深科技媒体人马修．布伦南的《抖音》首次说出完整的故事, 结合了精彩的内幕和洞见、字节跳动创业团队的稀有照片、精要图表, 是每位想了解网路趋势的读者必读之书.

results.title: 突破演算法、分享破百万的9大公式 : 为何他们的影片暴击人心, 创造话题、流量和商机? = Break through the noise : the nine rules to capture global attention / 提姆·史戴普, 乔许·杨著 ; 尤采菲译.
abstracts: 你会拍片、剪辑、上字幕, 但影片在网路上总是乏人问津? 社群平台的演算法改来改去, 很难及时因应? " 影片" 是最有力、最具效益的行销工具. 许多人每天一睁开眼, 就是滑手机, 然而千百则贴文、影片不断更新, 哪一则才能吸引他们停下、点阅甚至" 忍不住分享" ? FB、IG和YouTube的演算法每天都在改变, 再努力也敌不过, 难道没有一套普世适用的原则可以应万变? 本书作者提姆．史戴普( Tim Staples) 是美国知名行销公司" 分享力" ( Shareability) 的共同创办人兼执行长, 曾打造多支爆红病毒式影片, 频频创下惊人纪录. 作者认为, 创造高流量、突破演算的影片, 重点在于看透社群平台的机制, 也就是" 分享" 的本质. 书中提出" 9大公式" , 教你如何精通" 内容可分享性" 的强力心法、人们为什么会想分享他们所做的事( 背后的心理因素) , 以及最重要的, 如何运用有价值的内容, 用比传统广告低廉的成本来行销你的品牌.

results.title: Visual media for teens [electronic resource] : creating and using a teen-centered film collection / Jane Halsall and R. William Edminster.
abstracts: "If you would like to build or develop a film collection with guaranteed teen appeal, this guide is for you. It discusses what's current, popular with teens, and available; and provides annotated core filmographies in categories of heroes, exploring issues of identity, strong emotions: horror and humor, and educational entertainment. In addition, the authors address popular culture influences on teens, technology and format issues, how to get teen input, where to find reliable review sources, programming with films, and promoting and merchandising your collection. Packed with ideas as well as nitty gritty information; this guide fills a gap in the literature and a real need for the profession."--BOOK JACKET.

results.title: Major film directors of the American and British cinema / Gene D. Phillips.
abstracts: "This new edition of Major Film Directors of the American and British Cinemas is a revised, updated, and expanded version of the previous edition. Gene D. Phillips focuses on fourteen American and British directors to tell the story of the history of cinema from the days of silent movies to the advent of sound, color, and widescreen. Phillips has chosen those moviemakers who have made enduring works that still appeal to filmgoers today, as attested by their availability on television and on videocassette. Moreover, Phillips seeks to represent the various trends in filmmaking that have evolved over the years, such as American film noir, which is included in the discussion of Alfred Hitchcock's films, and British social realism, which is included in the discussion of Bryan Forbes's films."--Jacket.

results.title: The Hollywood posse : the story of a gallant band of horsemen who made movie history / Diana Serra Cary.
abstracts: After 1912, when the great cattle empires began to crumble, hundreds of seasoned cowboys found themselves jobless. A handful of discarded horsemen, however, stumbled upon an entirely new frontier - Hollywood. In a rare insider's view, Diana Serra Cary tells the story of these cowboys, who survived for another fifty years as riders, stuntmen, and doubles for the stars.

Filled with humorous anecdotes, The Hollywood Posse reveals the full story of the cowboys' long and bitter feud with autocratic director Cecil B. De Mille; their relationships with the great Western stars - from the flamboyant Tom Mix to the durable John Wayne; and above all, their touching loyalty, code of honor, and devotion to each other.

results.title: Cowboy metaphysics : ethics and death in westerns / Peter A. French.
abstracts: "Peter A. French examines the world of the western, one in which death is annihilation, the culmination of life, and there is nothing else. In that world, he finds alternatives to Judeo-Christian traditions that dominate our ethical theories, alternatives that also attack the views of the most prominent ethicists of the past three centuries."

results.title: The films of Oliver Stone / edited by Don Kunz.
abstracts: "The Films of Oliver Stone is a collection of essays on the work of one of Hollywood's most successful and controversial contemporary filmmakers. Stone's work has played a major role in the debate over whether Hollywood has promoted the decline of American culture during the last decade or merely reflected it." "The Films of Oliver Stone provides a more sophisticated, detailed, and probing analysis of Stone's career as a filmmaker than that available in the thousands of film reviews, personality profiles, and news items concerning Stone. The volume includes an interview with the filmmaker followed by fifteen essays by professors in departments of American studies, communication studies, English and American literature, and film and video studies."--Jacket.

results.title: Living pictures : the origins of the movies / Deac Rossell.
abstracts: This is the first book in English in nearly half a century to tell the full story of the international development of the first films, the origins of celluloid itself, the background of magic lantern shows (which were the first home of the movies), and the social influences on movie inventors and their chosen technologies. Living Pictures takes a new look at the international origins of moving pictures and examines the many solutions posed by Thomas Edison in America, the Lumiere brothers in France, Robert Paul in England, and Max Skladanowsky in Germany, among many other pioneering figures. Using concepts drawn from recent work in the sociology of the history of technology, Living Pictures places the invention of the movies firmly in the context of late nineteenth-century entertainment and explains clearly the motivations and accomplishments of the inventors in both America and Europe who brought the first movies to astounded audiences in 1895 and 1896.

results.title: Echo and Narcissus [electronic resource] : women's voices in classical Hollywood cinema / Amy Lawrence.
abstracts: Description based on print version record.
Includes bibliographical references (p. 199-203) and index.
Filmography: p. 205-206.

results.title: Captive bodies : postcolonial subjectivity in cinema / Gwendolyn Audrey Foster.
abstracts: Captive Bodies examines the film industry's fascination with bondage and captivity, seeking to revisualize American cinema through the lens of critical discourse on captivity narratives, slave narratives, and postcolonial critiques of cinematic constructions of "whiteness," "blackness," gender, and sexuality. Captivity is also examined here in relation to both those in front and behind the camera. Are we "subject" to others? Are we "bound" and "captive" in images? Are we "captive" bodies and "captive" audiences, held hostage to the spectacles of voyeuristic pleasure? Are those behind the camera involved in a process not unlike that of the slave system, enslaving the body in the image?.
To answer these and other questions, Captive Bodies draws upon a wide range of critical methodologies, including postcolonial studies, feminist film criticism, anthropology, and phenomenology.

results.title: Indiscretions : avant-garde film, video & feminism / Patricia Mellencamp.
abstracts: Indiscretions follows the path of U.S. avant-garde film and video from the underground of the 1960s to the academy of the 1980s. Patricia Mellencamp traces and charts the intersections of Lacanian psychoanalysis and the desiring male subject, Roland Barthes and texts of pleasure, Michel Foucault and the disciplinary society, the grotesque body and Mikhail Bakhtin, the rhizomatic alogic of Gilles Deleuze and Felix Guattari, and the female subject of feminist film theory. She creates a dialogue among theory and popular culture and politics through inventive readings of the films of Owen Land, Hollis Frampton, Ken Jacobs, Bruce Conner, Robert Nelson, Michael Snow, Yvonne Rainer, and Sally Potter, and videotapes by Ant Farm, TVTV, Michael Smith, William Wegman, and Cecelia Condit.

results.title: Cracks in the pedestal : ideology and gender in Hollywood / Philip Green.
abstracts: "Distinguishing his own neo-Marxist approach from that of other media scholars, Philip Green pursues two interrelated themes. In the first part of the book, he looks at the strategies Hollywood has employed to deflect or absorb the ideological challenges posed by the feminist critique of contemporary American society. He demonstrates the ways in which mainstream movies and television programs, no matter how unconventional or "subversive" they may appear, produce and reproduce familiar images of sexuality and gender identity. In the second part, Green highlights instances in which reproduction of the dominant ideology is less successful by examining several recent cinematic genres - the female action movie, the rape-revenge cycle, and the new film noir - that portray the real ambiguities of a social order in upheaval." "As a male consumer of the cultural commodities being discussed, the author offers a perspective on American films and television different from that of most other feminist critics."--Jacket.

results.title: Reality transformed : film as meaning and technique / Irving Singer.
abstracts: In Reality Transformed Irving Singer offers a new approach to the philosophy of film. Returning to the classical debate between realists and formalists, he shows how the opposing positions may be harmonized and united. He accepts the realist claim that films somehow "capture" reality, but agrees with the formalist belief that they transform it. Extending his earlier work on meaning in art and life, he suggests that the meaningfulness of movies derives from techniques that re-create reality in the process of presenting it to viewers who have learned how to appreciate the aesthetics of cinematic transformation.

results.title: Film genre 2000 : new critical essays / edited by Wheeler Winston Dixon.
abstracts: Includes bibliographical references and index.

results.title: The exploding eye : a re-visionary history of 1960s American experimental cinema / Wheeler Winston Dixon.
abstracts: The Exploding Eye explores the work of lesser-known American experimental filmmakers whose work has been excluded from the dominant film canon. Although the works of such artists as Michael Snow, Stan Brakhage, Bruce Conner, Robert Nelson, and Maya Deren are well-known to the contemporary scholar of independent cinema, there is an entire body of work created in the American experimental cinema that has been overlooked, work of considerable beauty and influence that was enthusiastically received when first released and that is still available for viewing today, awaiting long-overdue rediscovery.

Featuring more than seventy rare stills and complete information on the films and filmmakers covered, The Exploding Eye offers a fresh vision of American experimental film for critics, scholars, and the general reader.

Includes bibliographical references and index.

results.title: 一千零一个点子之后 : NETFLIX创始的祕密 = That will never work : the birth of Netflix and the amazing life of an idea / 马克·蓝道夫著 ; 许恬宁译. Yi qian ling yi ge dian zi zhi hou : NETFLIX chuang shi de mi mi = That will never work : the birth of Netflix and the amazing life of an idea / Make Landaofu zhu ; Xu Tianning yi.
abstracts: Netflix共同创办人暨第一任执行长马克‧蓝道夫, 娓娓道来Netflix如何从一个"概念"变成货真价实的"企业". 很久很久以前, 实体的录影带租片店称霸地球. 太晚还片？那就罚钱. 影片串流是什么, 可以吃吗？DVD会统一天下？那就跟车子会飞是一样的. 没错, 马克‧蓝道夫一九九七年酝酿创业点子时, 人们就是那样看待世界. 蓝道夫起初想得很简单, 他要靠网路提供租片服务. 每天早上, 蓝道夫在通勤途中, 向事业伙伴瑞德‧哈斯汀（Reed Hastings）抛出一万个异想天开的提案, 如客制化的棒球棍, 或是将洗发精送到你家. 想不到的是, 哈斯汀认为网路租片值得一试. 两人组队, 哈斯汀当主要投资人, 蓝道夫担任执行长, 一起成立公司. 如今的Netflix拥有超过一‧五亿订户, 感觉注定要崛起. 然而, 这间二十一世纪最具破坏性的新创公司, 一开始没有太多人看好, 跌跌撞撞. 蓝道夫红著脸请母亲担任早期投资人, 借用简陋的饭店会议室充当最早的办公室, 开业第一天伺服器就当掉. 还有一件事人们也津津乐道：Netflix当年曾厚著脸皮请百视达（Blockbuster）收购他们. 这段丑小鸭变天鹅的旅程显示, 只要肯拼, 有恒心有毅力, 坚持心底的声音, 即便全世界都唱衰你, 还是有可能改变世界. 然而, 这本书不只是内部人士跳出来谈全球最传奇的公司. 轻松流畅的文字, 串起各种违反直觉的概念, 替我们解答最基本的问题, 谈如何在事业或人生中放手一搏：要怎么开始？垂头丧气之际该怎么办？成功了又该怎么办？甚至到底什么叫"成功"？.

results.title: 虚拟YouTuber绊爱官方漫画精选集. 交朋友篇 / 津路参汰(Nitroplus), 安藤正基, タチ等作 ; 林星宇译. Xu ni YouTuber Banai guan fang man hua jing xuan ji. Jiao peng you pian / Jinlu Cantai (Nitroplus), Anteng Zhengji, Tachi deng zuo ; Lin Xingyu yi.

results.title: Television, nation, and culture in Indonesia [electronic resource] / Philip Kitley.
abstracts: The culture of television in Indonesia began with its establishment in 1962 as a public broadcasting service. From that time, through the deregulation of television broadcasting in 1990 and the establishment of commercial channels, television can be understood, Philip Kitley argues, as a part of the New Order's national culture project, designed to legitimate an idealized Indonesian national cultural identity. But Professor Kitley suggests that it also has become a site for the contestation of elements of the New Order's cultural policies. Based on his studies, he further speculates on the.

results.title: Digital television [electronic resource] : satellite, cable, terrestrial, IPTV, mobile TV in the DVB framework / Hervé Benoit.
abstracts: Written as an authoritative introduction, this text describes the technology of digital television broadcasting. It gives a thorough technical description of the underlying principles of the DVB standard following the logical progression of signal processing steps, as well as COFDM modulation, source and channel coding, MPEG compression and multiplexing methods, conditional access and set-top box technology. If you are looking for a concise technical b̀riefing' that will quickly get you up to speed with the subject without getting lost in the detail - this is the book you need.<B.
